mapper.select: SELECT B.boardno, B.title, B.writtendate , B.contents , B.views, B.userno, b.postno , p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate, p.writepermit, p.updatepermit, p.deletepermit FROM board B, perform_add P WHERE B.boardno = P.boardno AND substr(p.performdate, 1, 7) = #{searchMonth } ORDER BY ( SELECT performdate FROM perform_add PA WHERE pa.performno = p.performno AND performdate >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) , ( SELECT performdate FROM perform_add PA WHERE pa.performno = p.performno AND performdate < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ) , boardno

SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno AND substr(p.performdate, 1, 6) = #{searchMonth } AND b.postno = 1 ORDER BY p.performdate DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT b.boardno, b.title, b.writtendate, b.contents, b.views, b.userno, b.postno, p.performno, p.performname, p.performdate FROM board b, perform_add p WHERE b.boardno = p.boardno ORDER BY boardno DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) BOARD WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM board ORDER BY boardno
